document.full_text: new york yankees left-handed reliever pedro feliciano may be done for the season after tests showed a capsule tear in his left shoulder that might require surgery, the major league baseball team said thursday.
document.title: injured yankees reliever feliciano might miss season
lines_and_colors: new york yankees left-handed reliever pedro feliciano may be done for the season after tests showed a capsule tear in his left shoulder that might require surgery, the major league baseball team said thursday.
